column4: If I install the KDE Library on my computer, nothing will happen to it,  right?
but I only installed the kdelibs, will it crash?
Strugeon, can GNOME and KDE coexist without problems?
yes. You'll find info about that in the docs
where do I get the KDE Headers from?
you can use synaptic to install kde
will I still be able to use GNOME?
Intelikey, I just want the KDE Headers.
Intelikey,  "you've chosen, are no KDE headers installed".
Intelikey, so how will I tell Ubuntu to run GNOME, not KDE?
You can choose when you start the session
